main event: An amateur astronomer observed a green-yellow ball in the sky that dropped instantly and lasted for one second.
interesting points: The observed object was reported to be about one inch long., The object was visible for only one second., The object was described as a green-yellow color., Air traffic at Otis AFB included one C-121, one AW-65 Argos, and one F-101 at the time of the sighting., The conclusion of the report suggested it was likely an astronomical phenomenon such as a meteor.
witness description: amateur astronomer and a 10th grade student at Falmouth H.S.
